statements: UPDATE goods_movement SET status = 'IN_TRANSIT' WHERE movement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE goods_movement SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE location_id = 12345;
UPDATE goods_movement SET status = 'delivered', timestamp = '2022-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE movement_id = UUID('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000') AND location_id = 100;
UPDATE goods_movement SET location_id = 200, timestamp = '2022-10-16 08:45:00', status = 'in transit' WHERE movement_id = UUID('98765432-21ab-cdef-1234-567812345678');
UPDATE goods_tracking SET location_name='Warehouse A' WHERE tracking_id=101
UPDATE location_data SET longitude=50.12345, latitude=-30.67891 WHERE location_id=201
UPDATE goods_tracking SET location_name = 'Warehouse A' WHERE tracking_id = 12345;
UPDATE location_data SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060 WHERE location_name = 'New York City';
UPDATE Goods SET quantity = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MovementTracking SET location_id = 5, goods_id = 3 WHERE tracking_id = 10;
UPDATE Goods SET quantity = quantity + 10, name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MovementTracking SET timestamp = '2022-06-15 08:30:00', location_id = 5 WHERE goods_id = 3;
UPDATE Goods SET quantity = 100 WHERE goods_id = 1;
UPDATE Warehouse SET location_id = 3 WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
UPDATE LocationData SET location_name = 'New York' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE Warehouse SET location_id = 2, warehouse_name = 'Warehouse 2' WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE Goods SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Goods SET name = 'New Name', location = 'New Location' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Goods SET quantity = quantity - 5, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE Transactions SET quantity = 10, goods_id = 456, movement_id = 789 WHERE transaction_id = 987;
